The researcher of the Warfel has a sufficient one, that is: no one was rewarded, and he did not like him, and he did not make him formed from and otherwise.It was said: It is a negative for the adequate competent between the cows, and it is as it was seen.And "has" a prayer that is sufficient for what the mighty and others went to, and the origin is that it is delayed, except that it was presented to the perpetrator, because the intended is the exile of the reward for the reward.For the sacrifice, the news was also presented with the sponsorship of the communication.It was said to him that the disobedience is here, even if it is not a good thing that is invalidated by the meaning of the words; Because if you said: It was not a sufficient.He did not have any meaning, and when he was inserted to him, he became a house of news, so good.Abu Hayyan said: The words of Sibuyeh in the custodian who reconciles to be a news, which is the complete disobedience, and what is not here.Ibn al -Hajib said: The disobedience was presented to the communities and its pastors, and it was not presented to "anyone" so that it is not separated between the beginner and its informing of it, and it is a looked in it.Al -Kafr is a case from (one) presented to him as a sponsor of the twist, and that he does not confuse the clause or the prayer, and that it is an expert to be, and it is (the palm) To be a denial or a state of the guarantor in the fall of the fall as a news, and this direction was transferred by Abu Ali in the argument from some grammarians and he replied that it is as he heard from the father.A deficient difference that is not valid to be a news, for if it is estimated for him a special comment, which is similar, and it is like what the good is fulfilled, it is (sufficient).Perhaps the three sentences are sympathetic, without what he has prepared from this surah, because it was lined with one and one, and it is the exile of the similarity and the appropriateness of it.And what its sections are included because the similar is either a child or a father or a counterpart other than them, so that the sections of the sections are used and their meeting in the division is that the kindness is required in it as it is in it.The suffering.In (Kafu), there are languages: the cuff and their broken and open it with the composition of the fulfillment, and the cave was provided with the guarantee of the fulfillment.He read Hamza, Jacob, and a benefit in a narration: "efficiently" with prodigy, lightness, and thundering with the movement, and the replacement of the ham Al -Arjj, Abu Jaafar, Shabba, and a benefit in a narration, and in the other hand: “Kafay”, without a prodigy; We move the movement of the hamsti to fulfillment and delete the gossip.Solomon bin Ali bin Abdullah bin Abbas read: “efficient” by breaking the kaf and opening the fulfillment and tide, as in the saying of the naps: Do not eliminate me.That is, there is no example for him as the knowledge said, and this is the glorious surah, it has folded with the approach of its country to the distraction of divine knowledge and the Islamic standards; Therefore, he came in the news that came from the news, and he responded what he responded from the effects, and indicated the achievement of the meaning of the god The presence or principle of the existence of all the merits, then he commented that it is not that he is not born of it, because it is other than it, and it is other It is upset, and if it is a god of all the exhortations, it is a pleasure for the existence of it (P-278), then it is not permissible for the existence to be overlooked by the like, as it is not, as it is not.This is a man, that there is nothing in the existence of what is equivalent to the power of existence, so it is the first of the surah to the steadfastness in the two people of his life, and for the rest of it.It is not a crucial in the first place, and from the saying of the Almighty: He did not give birth to: One in Bayan is that it is not what he is equal to from his type, nor from his gender, not that he is not.It is born of it, nor that it is a budget in the existence, and with this exaggeration, the defamation of the definition of itself is glorified and glorified.I finish.In it, he indicated that he was not born like the illusion of what he accepted, as if he had said before: everything was material or had a relationship with the material, he would be a generation of one who is a good one.Speech: He did not give birth because he did not generate, and referring to his evidence with "he" is the first surah, for he was not when he has what he is, and only he is for him that he is not for him.He was born of his other, otherwise his identity is benefiting from others, so it is not for himself, and the appearance of kindness requires that the adoption of what he has indicated is what he has indicated While the face of his remembrance, some of them made kindness in which he is close to kindness: “They do not believe” on: “Do not be late”.Some of the predecessors indicated that the remembrance of that was because he came in the reason for the descent that they asked the Prophet, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, and peace be upon him.Safe such or such.And from the inheritance of the world and whoever inherits it?And the Imam said: He is God, one of three conservatives, and each one of them is a sign of the position of the students of the students, for the first place is the position of those close to those who are the highest places With the eyes of their minds to what things are things and their truths from where they are, and they have seen it, but the right is because it is that he is obligated to his soul, and what is his self, and what is the same for him Where itself is not, and they said: It is a sign of the right; As there is no way in their view, there is no longer to him, and he is grateful to him, to need to distinguish Likewise, they witnessed the creation, and a lot in the struggles in their view was not sufficient in referring to the right, but it is necessary for a distinction, so they needed that they would not be.He said to them: He is God.The third place: the shrine of the people of the North who are permissible to be more than one of the one, and God is also more surprised by "one" In response to them and heroes for their article, it ended.And some Sufis promised the word "He" from the meter of good names, but he said: The absence is the name of the Heg on the right to his domain of the distraction The freedoms of the breath in which the life of the soul and the loophole of its drawing with the surroundings and its arrangement from the number to its inhabitants and the numbers of its sins.And the debts reported that the imam said: He taught me some of the sheikhs: He is, who is he, who is not God, but he is, and on that, I will see the most.This is not mentioned in the acceptable news at the two speakers.And God Almighty knows.
